name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Java Engineer with over 10 years of robust experience in designing and delivering scalable backend systems focused on microservices and event-driven architectures. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring**, and adept in **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, leveraging **ReactJS** and **Redux** for frontend integration. Expertise in DevOps practices, including **CI/CD**, ensuring seamless deployment and integration across cloud environments. Demonstrated success in developing high-performing APIs and automation tools, with a strong foundation in cloud technologies. Proven track record of driving impactful projects across leading organizations, enhancing operational efficiency and delivering customer value.
